purpose: To explore and establish the scaling laws of multi-agent systems, facilitating efficient communication and cooperation among AI agents.
principle: Utilizes advanced multi-agent coordination techniques and deep learning models to enable communicative and cooperative AI systems.
reusability: Designed as a framework for developing and orchestrating multi-agent systems, offering extensibility through its modular architecture.
limitations: In its alpha stage, the framework may have stability issues and limited documentation; scalability and performance under large-scale scenarios are still being evaluated.
name: camel
description: üê´ CAMEL: The first and the best multi-agent framework. Finding the Scaling Law of Agents. https://www.camel-ai.org
highlight: First and best multi-agent framework focused on scaling laws of agents.
